content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was in parking lot of walgreens at 14 mile and middle belt road  @ 6:40pm looked up saw an egg with a silver tube coming out of the back of the egg right under the jet watched it until the jet went into the clouds. flew straight along under the jet. no change in feelings  or emotions. called the wb police they gave me oakland air port phone number.
content.summary: Silver egg with a trailing tube flying right  under a passenger jet

content.detailedDescription: With about 30 people at a bonfire, then a friend pointed out to me a black orb, i continued to watch, later two orbs emerged gradually, one rainbow and irredesent the other black aswell, as i continued to watch giant black lines emerge across the sky completely stretching horizontally out of view, strangely enough no one spoke about it to me other than the friend who pointed it out, aswell i'm not sure if anyone noticed the lines or if it was for some reason unviewable to others.
content.summary: One by one orbs of blackness and orbs of rainbow light emerge in the sky, they did not move, shortly after bands of pure black lines cross the sky surrounding the orbs of light, out stretching fully across the sky the process took twenty minutes to form.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming from food lion down genito going home
solid beam of focus light shining to ground
thought it was a helicopter until noticing that was no spot light
black almost invisible against the sky, blocked out stars behind it
shining a focus beam of light into a field(horse farm)when i noticed it
began to move across my path almost over me.
i was shocked, stunned and scared. being a navy vet(machinist mate, aircraft machinist mate)and a merchant seaman jr. engineer(qmed) at the time and been to hampton university for aviation mechanics i knew it was no helicopter or anything i had seen before(made no noise)i tried to flag some people down driving by but they didn't stop so i got back in my car and gave chase watching it till i came to a dead end in the neighborhood where i live, it very slowly and level went out of sight. when i got home i said nothing but my fianc√© asked what happened because of the look on my face and i told her what i had just seen and she laughed so i called my dad(world war 2 vet)and he laughed and they both told me to keep that to myself and i did until now. this wasn't my first time, once when i was in the navy and that time i wasn't by myself, myself and a friend was getting off mid watch in the north atlantic and i decided to take a smoke before going to my rack and he waited for me and we seen two very high making zig-zag before zipping off out of sight within seconds. as a merchant seaman i served on oceanographic survey ships.  there is more i will not say at this time because i'm confused and afraid to tell for fear of being ridiculed.
content.summary: Shaped like a hocky puck

content.detailedDescription: This actually started last winter right before the winter solstice when strange things started to happen for instance i was watching tv it was 3oclock in the morning when out of no where something grabbed me by the heart and locked it up completely for about 10 seconds totally paralized when it released my wife said do you see that and i said yes it just grabbed me by the heart and it just stood there and looked at usfor about a minute then walked away the same thing happened the next night so i told it to show his self to me and i closed my eyes and then it revealed itself to me and i did not no what it was until a week later when i was scrolling on you tube and there it was the same thing that was in my house a reptilian looking humanoid so things like this kept on happening. it got to the point me and my wife got on our knees one night crying our eyes out and asked the lord to come into our hearts and save us becasuse it was becoming so terrifying we did not no what else to do. and we had our kids do the same all 3 of my kids have seen it and they were scared too. shortly after that it stopped, for six months untill june 22 the day after the summer solstice, and has happened everyday since then ive got plenty of pics of this in my house outside all around everyday. i know this sounds crazy and everybody else thinks we are but i know we are not crazy what we are is scared to death, i even had one speak to me the other night they went in my kids room so i got up to see what was going on and again it locked me up and a womans voice told me to mind my own bussiness and stay on my face chat which i was doing before they came. i know there doing things to us while we are sleeping because i saw it doing something to my wife one night and tried to stop it but everytime i try it grabs me by the heart and i feel like im going to have a heart attack. now i have been doing extensive research on this and have came up with alot i would like to discuss with someone or just come out here and i will show you for youreself, because this is going on everyday of the week. there all around here. look you guys are the only ones that might even believe me about this i really dont expect you too but im sending a couple of pics to you and you decide for youreself, and ive got plenty more you can see if you do believe me, i had video too but one night when they came in they sprayed a mist at me and it knocked me right out when i woke up the videos were erased so ive been taking pics since. thank you.
content.summary: It was like something ive never experienced

content.detailedDescription:
It was in 1954 my mother and i were flying from san francisco to amarillo, texas. we left san francisco flew to new mexico (abq) landed for fuel. we left abq for our destination amarillo. i was setting in the aisle seat when my mother said "look out the window", i was a long silver cigar shaped object flying just off the tip the our plains wing. it had no sound, no wings, no engines'. i saw a very nice looking woman reading a magazine or newspaper, she was facing left of the craft in her seat and a man facing right of the craft facing her.  (odd)

she lowered what ever she was reading or looking at and looked at me, and smiled.

the object passed our plane at a steady speed, almost like they were sight seeing, then the craft was out of sight.

when we landed in amarillo two men can aboard the plane and said "if anyone had seen anything unusual to stay in their seats they would like to talk to us. (if anyone has any camera's to let them know). the men were dressed in very nice black suits and had very shinny shoes on.

my mom nudged me and said "don't say you saw anything or we will be here all day". the both of us walked off the plane.
content.summary: Cigar shaped, silver.

content.detailedDescription: On october 21 2014 at about 9:20, me and my girlfriend were sitting on my couch watching tv. i looked out my sliding door window out onto the front porch and could see a glowing object moving upward through the trees about 3 km away. i asked my girlfriend 'hey,  can you see that?' i moved onto the porch and watched it move through the sky in a very straight prominent line. like it knew where it was going, never going off course. this happened 5 different times with 5 different orbs. the objects were large and glowing red, yellow, and orange. once again all the objects moved in the exact same direction on the exact same line. they all looked exactly the same. i've never seen anything like this.
content.summary: The ufos asended  up through the trees about 3 km away from me and moved across the sky until gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking in the backyard, noticed sun rays over the umbrella, grabbed camera. it wasn't until i noticed two lines almost like sundays crossing the sun rays the wrong way that i noticed the object. , caught object in picture. then posted it on facebook. the pic. on facebook did not have object in it. i found that weird.
content.summary: Taking pics of sun rays caught object.

content.detailedDescription:
My grandparents lived on this road, and as my parents were separated, i spent a lot of time here growing up. several times at night, we would be driving home from church or from town late at night and see these fiery balls of light hovering over the road...Sometimes they would follow us, others they would appear in front of the vehicle. they would be there one minute and the next, they were just gone. 

these lights were seen by my family on many occasions, my grandmother says he has seen these for years...She has lived on this road since the early 1940's. my great grandfather reported to her that he once saw one land in the woods behind his house, and he had taken photographs of the indentations the feet of the object left in the mud, and branches broken where something heavy landed. these were the only thing he found as the object had disappeared in the time it had taken him to get his camera and gun and make it to the woods...

to me, there was no explanation as to what it was. my grandfather was in the army reserve, and even he was baffled by these strange things that were appearing. it didn't look like anything i have ever seen before. 

my friends and i called this little valley alien alley. i wouldn't walk down that road alone at night. the lights at the time made me scared because i was younger and didn't know what i was observing, but now that i have looked back at the experience, they didn't appear to he hostile...They could have easily harmed us if they so chose to...It was like they were observing our way of life...

i will never forget those times in the mountains, and trust me it has made me a believer.

if you're interested in the photos my great grandfather took of the indentations and the branches bent where something had landed, i will search for them for you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This happened the same way lots of times

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 9 of 9:  while they were traveling around their area, on several occasions during the month of may, during the evening twilight hours, observed objects with red and green lights in a rotating pattern.
content.summary: Many objects traveling west to east with red and green lights in a rotating pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 8 of 9:  several nights later than event 7, returned to (l2), near holmes and tucker rds, observed orange light with 2 bright white lights on rear, one blinking, passing by, traveling  e to ne then to n, returned passing overhead traveling on a southward path.
content.summary: Orange light with 2 bright white lights on rear, one blinking, passing by to ne then returned passing overhead with two white lights on the rear, one blinking.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 7 of 9:  while they were still at location (l2),  near holmes and tucker rds, about a half hour later observed six pairs of orange and white lights heading east, observed to the se.
content.summary: Observed six lights traveling in 3 sets of 2, following each other, then shifting into different patterns.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 6 of 9:  while they were traveling south along belleview rd saw twinkling objects to the se, they then turned east onto tucker rd near holmes rd, then they observed several orange/yellow and some white objects, then two more showed up.
content.summary: First saw bright white twinkling star-like objects then observed several orange/yellow and some white objects, then two more showed up.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 5 of 9:  while they were traveling nw along old plank rd near the soccer field they observed a black triangular object with red and green lights, very low to the ground, accompanied by a low volume jet noise hum.
content.summary: Black triangle object with red and green lights, very low to ground, accompanied by low volume jet noise hum.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 4 of 9:  on the next night of event 3, they were at witness (b)‚Äôs residence at location (l3), rives junction near wood and railroad st, when they again observed an object with white lights around it moving slowly eastward, they observed it for 40 minutes.
content.summary: Circular object with white lights around it, observed for 40 minutes, moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 3 of 9:  while they were at witness (b)‚Äôs residence at location (l3), rives junction near wood and railroad st, they observed an object with white lights around it moving slowly eastward, they observed it for 5 minutes.
content.summary: Circular object with white lights around it.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses; event 2 of 9:  while traveling south along m99 near the eagle rapids medical center, they observed a bright circular object at the tree-line to west, after turning down a side street to observe better, the object moved along slowly to the north, then shot up into the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: Bright white lights at or below tree-line moving slow then shot up into sky.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and (b) on many occasions, while traveling together or at several locations around jackson and eaton counties, have observed many unusual objects in the sky.  the following nine events were related from a 23may15 interview with the witnesses;  event 1 of 9:  while at their cabin location, while asleep, witness (a) was awaken by a bright circular object moving from side to side, shining into their bay windows, got up to get a better look and the object departed to the sw at 800 mph.  20 minutes later three aircraft flew over looking for the object.
content.summary: Blinding bright white light moving side to side shining in bay window.

content.detailedDescription:
This was a dream like none other. regressive hypnosis not involved. events clearly remembered upon awakening  and to this very day. the dream was very very real. involved many abductees. i want to know if others have reported same experience mid-june 1992 san gabriel valley in foothills of the san gabiel mountains, angeles national forest.  

the events:

i am reading in the middle of the night as i often did back then. noticed the time. about 3 a,m. then i doze off...Or do i?

the dream:  it is the middle of night.  i am awake in bed. my wife is sound asleep. she is next to me. a funny sensation overcomes me. a stillness. i begin to levitate above my bed. i grab my wife. she remains asleep. together we rise above the bed and float feet first through the bedroom doorway down the hall into the living room into the laundry room and out the back door. now outside we slowly rise above the house and into the air. we reach an altitude of several hundred feet possibly 1,000 ft. semi paralyzed i am able to look around and i see dozens of others in their pajamas floating through the air feet first like us. we are all moving in the same direction toward an unknown destination. i am able to see across  the san gabriel valley from a perspective of several hundred possibly a thousand feet above the ground. the valley lights, street lights, car lights, commercial lights light the valley in the normal way.

we abductees continue to float slowly. we eventually land in a field not far from our house possibly a thousand meters away..  beings in space suits attend to each of us.  a ufo is parked nearby in the field. the beings are administering shots. the one who gives us our shots, my wife's and mine removes her helmet and smiles. she is very asian in appearance with long black hair. 

i awake, the dream has ended and my wife and i are back in bed...Or did we ever leave? was it real or a dream? my wife remained asleep through the entire dream and has no memory of it. however, we both notice the next day that our upper arms are sore...As if we each had had a vaccination. 

dream two:  the very next night about the same time a second dream takes place. this time i hear a vehicle drive up our driveway. the property is five acres in size and the driveway is long, about 100 feet. i do not hear a gas engine purring. i instead hear wheels rolling on the ground. judging from the sound the vehicle rolls right up to our bedroom and parks. three sides of the bedroom walls are walls of glass. the drapes are drawn. i cannot see outside. suddenly i am paralyzed and then begin to rise above the bed. i float feet first right through the wall. i am now outside and can see an odd futuristic looking four wheel vehicle the size of an army tank. i float into it. i do not notice anyone in the vehicle. this vehicle then drives forward. i can see outside. it moves off the edge of the hill that drops off next to our bedroom and moves into another place, another dimension possibly. 

the next string i know i am in a rural,town. there is a human looking being nearby. i begin to run. he reaches for me. i pop him in the face which jars his face which then falls to the ground. he is a robot. i run...

the next thing i know i am back in bed awake. my wife is next to me asleep.
content.summary: Mass abduction. dozens in pajamas floating feet first to landing site.

content.detailedDescription:
Was downtown port angeles on beach w girlfriend, photographing beach. and  several military airtcraft, including a russian made antinov70 \ flying a ukranian flag. coast guard and chinook helicopters in area. girlfriend pointed out the orbs on way to the car after dark. had never seen, or read or heard about any such object. i was startled and unnerved...Took a few bad photos. went home and looked online and saw numerous accounts, photos and video of similar objects. mine were just hovering there, im really glad i didnt witness all the crazy stuff they apparently do in other peoples videos...If they did, im glad i missed that part of the act. the spinning mini spheres and flashing zones of plasma-like light were enough for me. what the hell are those things?
as a side note...Im from new york people in washington state are some complacent motherf...Ers. wake up. the military are flying helicopters and russian jets over your town and theres ufos hovering over the damned beach. and do you think anyone was taking pictures or raising an alarm or anything? nope. cant even get people here to look at the picture. they dont give a damn. wow. if this was new york there would have been a million people out there pointing and yelling. just saying.
content.summary: Was downtown to photograph military helicopters that were in the area (?) my gf pointed out the lights. like a disco ball the brighter one was, one orang third one redder in distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting on a ride to work out on porch when i saw a glowing ball 4ft atleast  come down a rd infront of hour house came into yrd stopped infront of tv dish i was scared n excited at same time i wanted to touch it but chickened out just 4 or 5 ft from it no reflection but was beautifull blue glow haze n silverish haze weird coloar stayed in front of dish 3 to 4 min then slowly went behind house up n down over mt out of sight im retired army never seen nothing like that
content.summary: Was big blue metallic orb 5 ft away in yr infront of tv dish

content.detailedDescription: Following a yard sale last night we were standing outside my sister in-laws home when my brother in-law shouted whats that? a ufo?  i immediately looked up and saw a bright orange object moving across the sky.  i served in the usaf for 24 years and have never seen anything like this.  the sky was solid overcast and this object was moving in a straight line below the clouds.  the shape we observed was half moon shape with the curved edge facing the direction of travel,it was completely silent no sound whatsoever.  i grabbed my cell phone and snapped a photo of it.  upon examining the photo i saw only what appeared to be a star next to a tree when i zoomed in on the star a definite shape can be seen and no star could have possibly been seen under the overcast.  after snapping the photo the object continued its travel and the orange light went out and we observed a dark shape until it disappeared from view.  i have been a airplane nut for years and pride myself on identifying aircraft, both military and civilian, i have never seen anything like this.  how the orange glow did not show in the photo is beyond me.  i have always believed in ufo's and have seen a few but have never been able to photograph one, until now.
content.summary: Seen by brother and sister in-law as well as myself a glowing orange object moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were on our way to sterling co. to pick up a friend that just finished a turn around at work. it was about 2 a.M. on a remote hwy in kansas.We hadn't seen a car,house.Light pole or anything for a couple hundred miles, when all of a sudden a pyramid shaped craft with green flames around it appeared about 25ft in front of the car spinning slowly it was quiet and made no wind wen it went by.It was gold,brass,or bronze.Had octagons all over it each one had a circle directly in the center,and had some kind of magnetic activity going wild on them. i stoped the car and we watched it. it landed in the hills, then shot up about 100ft instantly. and was gone so we looked for it and saw it on the other side of us hovering and shining a white beam on a big bent up metallic object. then i thought theres nothing for hundreds of miles why am i standing here. but we dnt remember much after that. all we remember is pulling up at a gas station on empty and my car gets 450 miles to a tank and it was daylight. but since them ive been having weird dreams..... it sounds weird but i was tought how to build a purpullsion system without heavy chenicals,its a non chemical based engine. and thats just one of my dreams... hope to hear from yall for a more detailed account..
content.summary: Scary,was really close saw every detail

content.detailedDescription: I keep seeing this same object .I have seen this oval shape white object at least six times starting in feb 2015.Is anyone else seeing this object?
content.summary: I watched if from my back patio while having my coffee i watched it go in a straight line for about 3 minutes and then just in a blnk of an eye gone.

content.detailedDescription:
4 spheres traveled in a perfect square formation from west to east at the base of the clouds. the upper two occasionally were obscured by the clouds they traveled past/through. all four traveled faster than the clouds. no sound. 
i was on the roof of the free methodist church, guadalupe, cebu city (singson road). this roof area has a washing machine and sink, and a large open area, and a smaller roofed area, otherwise open. i was playing with the dogs when i noticed the objects. the square formation was striking. it was a perfect square. the formation held and i called it to the attention of my friend linda. 
the fours spheres appeared dark. they were backlit by bright clouds however. at closest approach, there was some wobble in the formation, with the upper spheres falling behind or getting ahead a bit. as if the whole formation were propelled by a wind. however, they traveled much faster than the clouds they passed through.
my feelings were mostly curiosity. i wanted to get my phone to take a pic, but it was downstairs charging. i also knew if i left to get the phone, the spheres would be gone by the time i got back. the spheres traveled east toward the mountains until they were too small to see.
content.summary: 4 spheres traveled in a perfect square formation from west to east at the base of the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was in a taxi coming home from a night out.I and the taxi driver observed 2 bright lights as we was heading north on auburn rd.Then a 3rd light appeared they formed a triangle formation.As we drove i lost sight of the objects for  a few seconds.When i sighted them again the objects had moved away from each other.There was a bright white light orb in the northern sky and to the left of it was a dimmer white light.As i got closer to home i asked the taxi driver to stop i had a ufo sighting last year and no camera.Well this time i got my proof thankyou samsung.From the brightest orb 3 orange lights appeared to come out of it.I assume it was a mother ship of some sort.Just a guess.3 orange orbs went different directions none followed a the path of the other.1 orange orb flew west and another south.The 3rd orb was flying in a circle around the other brighter white light orbs.I watched this for about 15min it was something you never will forget as long as you live.I have pictures and a short video of this event.I will give any evidence i have to mufon rep.Last year i had an ufo sighting and mufon help me in the sighting.Thankyou
content.summary: Seen 5 ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out and looked up, saw three objects just hovering there. thought they were planes before i noticed they were not moving. a plane came by and at that point i knew they weren't planes. the light were in the center of the objects moving around them quickly, red, green, blue and white. i tried to snap sits with my phone but did no justice. grabbed my other camera and turned the flash on, when i did that they appeared to slowly go out se at a very slow pace then stopping again maybe a half mile out.I text a friend of mine to see if she were up and had her call me. her and her son's went out and the objects were already a little further out but could see the 3 in a triangle form and the lights. thought if those were planes i would see them anymore. after watching them for about 45 minutes i came back inside, they were still in the same spot.
content.summary: Three objects round in size with flashing light traveling in a triangle form hovered for about 20 minutes before slowly moving away

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from a business trip for enterprise product partners and was returning form albuquerque to farmington nm. it was late at night around 11:00pm as i was traveling north on hwy 550 just outside the town of san ysidro when i noticed that the stars were particularly bright in the eastern sky. i didn't think anything of this as the stars are often quite bright in new mexico when one is away from city lights, especially during colder weather. as i crossed into the jemez rez. i noticed that there was a ringing in my ears. again i didn't think anything of this as i was driving home after a long flight from louisiana evaluating large natural gas processing turbines at a processing facility and figured that i had been exposed to a bit to much high frequency noise. i turned on the radio and searched for a radio station out of texas that is the only one receivable in the remote area to drown out the ringing, only this time there were no am station that my truck radio could receive. i turned off the radio and noticed that the radio was still making a humming noise. again i didn't think much of this as company vehicles often have electronic accessories such as lap tops, cell phones, booster, etc. that can cause this issue. although this problem didn't exist until then. again i didn't think anything about this as i just wanted to get home and had a long drive ahead. there were no other vehicles on the highway either north or south bound though this to is not unusual on 550 at time of night. i was trying to organize my thoughts to the report that i was to file the following day when i noticed out of the passenger window a group of what seemed like 3 stars on the horizon above the mountains that were almost keeping pace with my speed. my first thought was they were aircraft. shortly there after there was a 4th light and again i didn't pay much attention as the 4 corners area often sees multiple commercial aircraft passing overhead. about 5 mins later another light appeared then another and again another in the shape of a horizontal arc. i have seen many odd lights at night during my career in the oil and gas ind. so to me it was just another curiosity. the lights however didn't go away and continued to pace my vehicle. i pulled over at a turn-around to relieve myself and noticed that there were 2 other shapes with the same pattern of lights that seemed to be at different altitudes slightly to the northeast and the southwest. at this time i noticed that they were no longer moving but seemed stationary. the lights to the northeast seemed to have a shape that was illuminated by what i assumed was the city lights of santa fe to the east. i truly believed that this was a cloud or something that was playing tricks on the eye at i was tired, so i entered my truck and opened a soda and turned the ignition. the truck had a had time starting which was strange as all company vehicle are fleet maintained and regularly serviced. the truck did start on the 5th try, i made a note to have the truck in for service and pulled back onto the highway. i glanced over and noticed that the arc of lights appeared to have moved closer and again seemed to keep pace with my vehicle. i also noticed that as the lights moved along that the stars in the background would disappear like something was passing in front of them. i increased speed to about 85mph then 95mph which are common speeds late at night on this stretch of highway and with each speed change (faster and slower) the lights kept exact pace. at this time i was becoming nervous and was looking forward to arriving in cuba nm where i would stop and fuel up and wait awhile. entering cuba nm is very distinct as anyone who has travel in the area knows that police repeatedly patrol the area looking for speeders. i was honestly hoping to see a state trooper. the lights kept following my vehicle and drifting closer toward the highway to a point that they seemed to take up the entire passenger side windows of the crew-cab 1/2 ton chevrolet pickup. i began to feel nauseous and i could hear the ringing in my ears over the sound of the whine of the tires on the asphalt. i was becoming quite disturbed at this time and was beginning to desperately look for the lights of cuba. i remember clearly that i was traveling at 103mph, the trucks top speed when the lights passed overhead and blocked out the stars and cast what seemed like a shadow over the area. the starlight was gone for possibly 10 seconds and then drifted back toward the northeast and then raised up and was gone. i saw street lights in the distance and assumed that i was finally reaching cuba nm. i slowed to the posted speed limit of 70 mph and felt somewhat relieved that what ever was going on was over. as i neared closer to the street lights they were quite different form the lights of cuba ( with which i am very familiar with as i have made this drive many times) i continued to slow as i approached the lights and realized that they were the yard lights of what is known as hill top store, a gas station and store 10 miles from bloomfield nm. almost 100 miles from where i believed i was. i have absolutely no memory of traveling this distance. no memory of passing through cuba or a number of other small settlements and landmarks that are used to gage distances at night. the ringing in my ears was gone along with the nausea, and the truck was functioning normally with 3/4 of a tank of fuel. the clock in the truck was exactly 1 hour and 38 minutes slower than the wall clock within hill top store. i was shaken and took about 20-30 min to gather myself then continued home. during the next 3 weeks i  experienced odd rashes on my body and sleep issues as well as other changes. i used to have black/dark brown hair which then began to turn spotty grey. there are times when i feel unexplainably tired and confused since this incident. i do not understand what may have happened and don't know what may or may not be taking place. i am a professional in the energy industry and need answers.
content.summary: Noticed 3 large objects that seemed to follom my vehicle

content.detailedDescription: During the time my sister and i were heading to her apartment. when we turned out of our parents house i saw something extremely bright hovering in the distance over a neighborhood. i thought it was a helicopter, but it wasn't moving, just staying completely still.  heading down pflumm road, i realized that it was mad of three lights. you could see a triangle shaped out of the three lights, it was darker than the night sky. i quickly told my sister to turn around when we reached the next light. once we turned, the bright lights were gone. we parked the car, looked around in the sky but saw no trace.
content.summary: Bright lights shaped of a triangle, extremely bright, hovering on top of houses.

content.detailedDescription: I recently reported something that happened to me in 1973. i have not witness anything unusual since then untill recently. i was driving my work van back from victoria, tx. near rosenberg, tx i happen to look up in the sky at some dark clouds and as they parted a little i saw what i thought was a strange looking flag. i wanderd to myself what kind of flag is that?Some trees were blocking my vision somewhat & when i passed them by i could tell that this was not a flag since it was very large & about 1/2 - 1 mile up in the air. it was a throw pillow shaped object about 250 by 300ft at least. it was just hovering there. if i had been in any other spot i probably would not of noticed it. it looked goldish orange to me at the time but realized later when thinking about it it was probably silver & reflecting the morning orange sky off the surface of the object. the reason i thought it was flag at first was that it was fluttering like a flag would sort off, but it was just the 4 corners that were waving around. did not look real like something out of a futuriztic syfy movie but not like i had seen before. it was not horizontal with the ground but the object was upright like if a flag would be. it was quite large with what looked like some sort of round whitish circle in the middle. it took a couple minutes or so to dawn on me that this was a large object just hovering there in the air. looked like it was using the dark clouds to hide behind. it has taken a couple of days to sink in that this was nothing i ever saw or even thought of before. haven't been able to stop thinking about it. i kept saying tomyself was this a obtical illusion or something but i have come to realize i saw something that was no way normal. it was something i never even imagined a ufo would look like. i can't stop thinking about it. either i actually saw something that is not of this earth as far as i know or i was hullucinating.
content.summary: Large throw pillow shaped reflectve object

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving out to my gym and quite an event transpired en route.
as i progressed in a southerly direction on haverhill road in west palm beach, i happened to notice several glowing, red-orange orbs alternately hovering and sometimes rapidly accelerating, travelling in a west to east course. at first, it was very striking to see this, because i estimate at least 10 orbs were moving in odd formations, but it appeared as if they at the same time had some sort of eventual destination. it was difficult to judge the size of the orbs, as their motion was quite frenetic at times.
my mind began to try to dissect what it could have been. the palm beach international airport is nearby, but i know for certain there's no way these were airliners, learjets, military craft or helicopters.
after about 30 seconds they started to approach my position, near the intersection of haverhill rd. and belvedere rd.
i almost caused an accident as i veered into another lane inadvertently as i was trying to get a good view of the objects/craft.
eventually, after maybe 20- 40 seconds, the craft were past my position, and i took my right to turn on belvedere rd. to proceed to the gym, but i could barely see the craft when i peered over my right shoulder, and there were 4-6 orbs left at this point. i looked back after taking a peak at the road in front of me, and when i looked back towards the eastern sky, they were gone ! my view was also severely obstructed by trees and power lines by this time. 
i'm certain, with the way these objects moved, and the speeds at which they moved, they weren't man-made and most likely not of this earth, or dimension. they made a bizarre hissing sound at first, but as i watched them, i noticed they seemed to be moving silently, but deftly. they had a certain agility to them that evoked a subtly frightening and eerie feeling.
i've tried to be fair and take every possibility into account, including flares, meteors/space debris, balloons, helicopters, planes... but, what i saw was none of those earthly things.
it was a fascinating and mesmerizing sight that i won't soon forget.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 15 to 25 glowing orange - yellow orbs with transparent structure
